item.description:
Tonight is part of The Beachfest series of FREE outdoor concerts and fireworks. The stage is set up at the end of the boardwalk - at the beach. Please make sure to bring a chair or blanket (maybe insect repellent) to sit on. Pizza, etc to buy or bring your own snacks -cooler. It's up to you.......

Tonight's scheduled band is: ENTRAIN (www.entrain.com)

Music begins at 7:30.

Fire Works at 10:15

It's a FUN night out!

* We can meetup curbside at Sal's - at the very end of Broadway. I will either be wearing a meetup.com pin or have a sign for anyone who doesn't know me. I will also remit my cell # to all 'yes' RSVP . This event is shared with other meetup groups.

THIS IS AN ALL-OUTDOOR EVENT. RAIN CANCELS. I will update if the weather is questionable.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: BEACHFEST: FREE Outdoor Concert & Fire Works-ENTRAIN!
